SELECT /* 메뉴 리스트 조회 */ CD_ID AS GDS_SCLASS_CD /* 상품소분류코드 */ ,CD_NM AS GDS_SCLASS_NM /* 상품소분류명 */ FROM TB_COM100 -- 공통코드 WHERE GRP_CD_ID = 'GDS_SCLASS_CD'
AND CD_ID BETWEEN '11' AND '19'
AND CD_ID BETWEEN '21' AND '29'
AND CD_ID BETWEEN '31' AND '39'
AND CD_ID BETWEEN '41' AND '49'
AND CD_ID BETWEEN '51' AND '59'
AND CD_ID BETWEEN '61' AND '69'

SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1 AS RNK /* 랭크 */ ,AAAA.* FROM ( SELECT AAA.* FROM ( SELECT BB.* , COALESCE (AA.CNT, 0) AS CNT /* 대상 건수 */ , COALESCE (AA.TOT_GRD_SUM, 0) AS TOT_GRD_SUM /* 토탈점수합계 */ , COALESCE (AA.TOT_GRD_AVG, 0) AS TOT_GRD_AVG /* 토탈점수평균 */ FROM ( SELECT GDS_CD , COUNT(A.GDS_CD) AS CNT , SUM(A.GRADE) AS TOT_GRD_SUM , ROUND(SUM(A.GRADE) / COUNT(A.GDS_CD),2) AS TOT_GRD_AVG FROM TB_GDS210 A /* 렌탈상품후기 */ GROUP BY A.GDS_CD ) AA RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT /* */ A.GDS_CD ,A.GDS_LCLASS_CD ,A.GDS_MCLASS_CD ,A.GDS_SCLASS_CD ,A.GDS_NM ,A.BRAND_NM ,A.MODEL_NM ,B.IMG1 ,A.REG_DT ,B.GDS_PRICE ,A.GDS_GB_CD , CASE WHEN A.GDS_GB_CD = 'N' THEN '새상품' WHEN A.GDS_GB_CD = 'U' THEN '중고상품' ELSE '누락' END AS GDS_GB_NM FROM TB_GDS100 A /* 공통상품 */ ,TB_GDS200 B /* 렌탈상품상세 */ WHERE A.GDS_CD = B.GDS_CD AND A.GDS_MCLASS_CD = #{gdsSclassCd} ) BB ON AA.GDS_CD = BB.GDS_CD ) AAA ORDER BY AAA.TOT_GRD_AVG DESC ,AAA.CNT DESC ,AAA.REG_DT DESC ) AAAA ,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R LIMIT 8

SELECT /* */ BB.GDS_CD ,BB.GDS_LCLASS_CD ,BB.GDS_MCLASS_CD ,BB.GDS_SCLASS_CD ,BB.GDS_NM ,COALESCE(AA.CNT, 0) AS CNT ,COALESCE(AA.TOT_GRD_SUM, 0) AS TOT_GRD_SUM ,COALESCE(AA.TOT_GRD_AVG, 0) AS TOT_GRD_AVG FROM ( SELECT A.GDS_CD ,COUNT(A.GDS_CD) AS CNT ,SUM(A.GRADE) AS TOT_GRD_SUM ,ROUND(SUM(A.GRADE)/COUNT(A.GDS_CD),2) AS TOT_GRD_AVG FROM TB_GDS210 A /* 렌탈상품후기 */ GROUP BY A.GDS_CD ) AA RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GDS_CD ,A.GDS_LCLASS_CD ,A.GDS_MCLASS_CD ,A.GDS_SCLASS_CD ,A.GDS_NM ,A.BRAND_NM ,A.MODEL_NM ,B.IMG1 ,A.REG_DT ,B.GDS_PRICE ,A.GDS_GB_CD ,CASE WHEN A.GDS_GB_CD = 'N' THEN '새상품' WHEN A.GDS_GB_CD = 'U' THEN '중고상품' ELSE '누락' END AS GDS_GB_NM FROM TB_GDS100 A /* 공통상품 */ ,TB_GDS200 B /* 렌탈상품상세 */ WHERE A.GDS_CD = B.GDS_CD AND A.GDS_CD = #{gdsCd} ) BB ON AA.GDS_CD = BB.GDS_CD

SELECT A.GDS_CD ,A.GDS_LCLASS_CD ,A.GDS_MCLASS_CD ,A.GDS_SCLASS_CD ,A.GDS_NM ,A.BRAND_NM ,B.GDS_PRICE ,B.AGREE_TERM ,B.DELIVER_COST ,B.INSTAL_COST ,B.AS_CONDITION ,A.MODEL_NM ,B.IMG1 ,B.IMG2 ,B.IMG3 ,B.IMG4 from TB_GDS100 A /* 공통상품 */ ,TB_GDS200 B /* 렌탈상품상세 */ WHERE A.GDS_CD = B.GDS_CD AND B.GDS_CD = #{gdsCd}
